content: embrace the holiday spirit with my charming christmas angel crochet pattern this delightful hanging ornament is perfect for adorning your tree or gifting to loved ones the easy-level pattern includes a detailed photo tutorial and written instructions making it accessible for crocheters of all skill levels worked flat and in the round this top-down design allows you to create a beautiful angel in no time add a touch of handmade magic to your holiday decor with our christmas angel pattern **unique features-** easy-level pattern suitable for all skill levels detailed photo tutorials and written instructions included worked flat and in the round for a versatile construction perfect for creating festive decorations or thoughtful gifts **materials needed-** yarn red heart super saver solids in aran weight approximately 72 yards hooks 4mm us size 6 0 2 25mm us size 1 0 **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels
